sys_script_include.name: getAssociatedCourses

sys_update_version.name: sys_script_include_b87ae77747732110b75a5e52e36d43c3
sys_update_version.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_include"><sys_script_include action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><access>package_private</access><active>true</active><api_name>x_1052872_needit.getAssociatedCourses</api_name><caller_access/><client_callable>true</client_callable><description/><name>getAssociatedCourses</name><script><![CDATA[// Script include function to retrieve associated courses

function getAssociatedCourses(universityField) {

  var universityRecord = universityField.getReference(); // Retrieve the selected university record

  var courses = []; // Array to store associated courses


  // Query the associated courses based on the university

  var courseGR = new GlideRecord('x_1052872_needit_university_and_course_enrollment'); // Replace 'course_table' with the actual table name for courses

  courseGR.addQuery('university', universityRecord.sys_id); // Assuming 'university' is the reference field on the course table that references universities

  courseGR.query();


  while (courseGR.next()) {

    // Create an object with the necessary course information

    var course = {

      sys_id: courseGR.getValue('sys_id'), // Assuming 'sys_id' is the field on the course table that represents the unique identifier

      name: courseGR.getValue('name') // Assuming 'name' is the field on the course table that represents the course name

    };


    courses.push(course); // Add the course to the array

  }


  return courses;

}]]></script><sys_class_name>sys_script_include</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2023-07-10 06:53:35</sys_created_on><sys_id>b87ae77747732110b75a5e52e36d43c3</sys_id><sys_mod_count>1</sys_mod_count><sys_name>getAssociatedCourses</sys_name><sys_package display_value="NeedIt" source="x_1052872_needit">55f649cc47132110b75a5e52e36d4379</sys_package><sys_policy>read</sys_policy><sys_scope display_value="NeedIt">55f649cc47132110b75a5e52e36d4379</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_script_include_b87ae77747732110b75a5e52e36d43c3</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2023-07-10 07:07:44</sys_updated_on></sys_script_include></record_update>
